titleStmt.title: Of alterations strange, of various signes, heere are compos'd a few poetick lines heere you may finde, when you this book have read, the crowne tranform'd into the poets head : read well, be merry and wise / written by John Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
